members.name: Diego
members.description: Hi, I'm Paul, a student of {#} semester of the {% 20x} degree. Currently, I am a programmer and leader in RoboCup @Home. I am passionate about @Home because it is a very scalable project with a lot of potential for social impact, in addition to allowing me to work with a multidisciplinary team. I am interested in working in embedded systems, web development and data science. I like cats and post music. hfhfhf ldaxhldw kajxksj hello i love you wont you
